title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and cook in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Avocado Toast Supreme
instructions: Toast the sourdough bread until golden brown.
Mash avocado with lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Fry or poach eggs to your preference.
Top with sliced cherry tomatoes, crumbled feta, and cooked egg.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.
